---
# Sample optimized prompt template (ready to copy/paste)
---

Write a concise, user-facing instruction in English that preserves the following constraints: [CONSTRAINTS]. Provide only the required output in [FORMAT].

Examples:
- Follow-up email to client who hasn't replied to proposal two weeks ago: cordial tone; highlight key benefits; ask for meeting availability; 150–200 words.
- Executive summary in 5 bullets, each ≤20 words; no value judgments.
